string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Through the Road to Oblivion5
I received permission to go all the way to #m270030500#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270030500##k and defeat the Guardian of the Temple, #r#o8220006##k. \n\n#o8220006# #r#a35191##k
I defeated #o8220006#. #p2140000# granted me permission. I should be able to go past the Road to Oblivion now.
If you want to go in further, you'll need to take a harder test... Makes perfect sense, no? So what do you want? Do you want the new test?
Then go to #b#m270030500##k and defeat #r#o8220006##k, the Guardian of the Temple who protects the Road to Oblivion. If you defeat the Guardian of the Temple, I will grant you permission to move ont.
That's too hard for you? That's too bad then. I guess that's just your limit.
You've defeated #o8220006#. That's amazing. I will grant you the permission as promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to go into the deepest part of the temple.#k
Go on. Into the deep, heart of the temple...
You haven't defeated #r#o8220006##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
